total-budget.notes: This is already published as a document. Biennium Budget. Published in machine-readable format (as links) from November 2012.

recipient-country-budget.notes: Published as part of CPD and CPAP (documents). Published machine-readable format (as links) from November 2012.

document-link.notes: Strategic Plan is already published. Policy documents (poverty, energy, etc.) are also published. Published in machine-readable format (as links) from November 2012.

title.notes: In some cases, UNDP uses the official local language.

description.notes: In some cases, UNDP uses the official local language.

activity-status.notes: UNDP publishes the activity status at the project level (activity level 1).

activity-date.notes: UNDP publishes the activity start date at the project level (level 1).
UNDP publishes the activity end date at the project level (activity level 1).

contact-info.notes: Publish country office registry email address.

participating-org.notes:
In Atlas equates to fund and donor codes.
Atlas: Implementing Partner
Not captured in Atlas. For reporting purposes, accountable institution and implementing will be the same.

recipient-region.notes: Since UNDP's definition of regions is different from IATI's, for the November 2011 publication, UNDP will use IATI code 998 (Unspecified), but will put UNDP's region descriptions.

location.notes: Project locations are published in project documents. Geocoding of project locations is under development and will be available in 2013

sector.notes: UNDP uses a matching table to combine DAC Sector and UNDP outcomes UNDP will use the definition of its Focus Area assurance.

policy-marker.notes: Gender policy marker is in Atlas. Data quality will need to be reviewed.

collaboration-type.notes: By default, UNDP Collaboration type is 'multilateral outflow'

default-flow-type.notes: By default UNDP assistance is Oficial Development Assistance (ODA)

default-finance-type.notes: By default all UNDP assistance is grants

default-aid-type.notes: By default UNDP Aid Type is 'project-type intervention'

default-tied-status.notes: By default UNDP aid is not tied

transaction.notes: UNDP will publish project level budgets.
Annual expenditure at the project level for 2010.

document-link.notes: UNDP already publishes all documents; however these are spread across global, regional and Country Offices websites. Consolidated document publishing is introduced through open.undp.org from Nov 2012

activity-website.notes: This will be availbale in most cases via the corresponding country office website. The links for these sites are published.

related-activity.notes: On the November 2011 publication, activities were reported at level 2 - output level. In succeeding publications, activity at the project level, level 1, are included (please refer to UNDP's 'Definition of an activity and multi-level activities' above).

conditions.notes: No. By default UNDP does not attach policy conditions to its assistance. Operational conditions are published as part of SBAA.

result.notes: Under development. The suggested format for results data is a model to allow those that already publish results as data to do so in an internationally comparable format, should they so wish. Should future international agreements elsewhere on results data supersede the suggested data format, this will be updated accordingly.
